page.title: 16A FARM LABOURER
page.content: A{FARM LABOURER}WOKE UP FROM 4_6 A.M. HE LEFT SCHOOL AT 14 BECAUSE EDUCATION WAS NOT NECESSARY JUST COMMON SENCE. ALL WORK WAS DONE BY HAND AND LARGE MACHINERY PULLED BY HORSES. THE FARMERS USED TO GROW ALOT MORE ROOT CROPS LIKE TURNIPS OR MANGOLDS. THERE WHERE{10TIMES}AS MANY MEN AS THERE IS NOW. MOST OF THE FARMS WHERE HIRED SO THE FARMER COULDN'T AFFORD TO WASTE A THING. A LABOURERS WAGE WAS{10 SHILLINGS}BUT A MARRIED MAN EARNED UPTO{30 SHILLINGS.}AT HARVEST A BIG MACHINE CALLED A SELF BINDER GATHERED UP MOWED CORN, THRESHED IT AND TIED UP THE CORN. IT TOOK SO LONG TO DO THE HARVEST THAT THE MEN FROM ALL THE FARMS USED TO HELP EACH OTHER. THEY WORKED 12HRS. A DAY 6 DAYS A WEEK. { WRITTEN BY GEORGE.YOUNGS.
